entry.title: Combined summary - addr/getaddr behaviour
entry.summary: The user is seeking information about the specification and coding of nodes in a protocol, particularly regarding how nodes will periodically heartbeat their own external address. The protocol documentation mentions this feature, but the user is unsure about whether nodes repropagate these messages and how they distinguish them from other address messages.In addition to seeking clarification on the above points, the user also wants guidance on where to find the code that sends and receives these address messages.
